messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: SSSuit sssensssorsss to max, alssso i will persssionally be doing exparamental sssurgerysss and implantsss, requessst them via pda and il plot you down in the lissst and il call you down when your ready

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division Server Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a swarm of wire eating mammals have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.
